name: スチーム・ハーツ
summary: Steam-Heart's (スチーム・ハーツ) is an erotic vertical shooter game developed by GIGA and initially released by TGL for the PC98 platform in 1994. It later made its way to the PC Engine Super CD-ROM² and then the Sega Saturn. The game features action mixed with adult content, as well as a two-player mode.
